meanings.definition: A small cavity, sac, or gland, in particular.
meanings.sent1: The hair follicle protects the root of the hair.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the follicle to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent3: The follicle whispered secrets to the neighboring cells.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a follicle of creativity, bursting with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The follicle was like a tiny treasure chest, holding precious information within.

meanings.definition: A small secretory cavity, sac, or gland, in particular.
meanings.sent1: The sebaceous follicle produces oil to keep the skin moisturized.
meanings.sent2: The follicle released hormones into the bloodstream.
meanings.sent3: The follicle decided to take a day off and stop producing sweat.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed out of him like a follicle of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The follicle was a busy factory, churning out essential substances for the body.
